Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Since its inception, our company has been committed to producing and delivering premium entertainment video content across a diverse range of fields, including travel, sports, lifestyle, and narrative short films. We strive to provide high-quality leisure and storytelling videos to a global audience, utilizing innovative technologies and platforms to make these contents more accessible and engaging. This DataCap application aims to store our extensive collection of leisure videos and narrative short films on the Filecoin network, ensuring the security, integrity, and long-term availability of this valuable data.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: This dataset comprises a diverse array of leisure video content, spanning entertainment, travel, sports, lifestyle, and more. The videos are available in high-definition formats, optimized through compression and processing for seamless streaming and downloading. By storing this data on the Filecoin network, we ensure its long-term durability, enhanced security, and global accessibility for users worldwide.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: The data will undergo local processing, including compression, conversion, and standardization, utilizing tools such as FFmpeg to ensure all videos meet the necessary requirements for storage and transmission. Following this, the graphsplit program will be employed to generate a .car file that adheres to the specified standards. Finally, the venus tool will be used to package the data, ensuring it is optimized for secure and efficient storage on the Filecoin network.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, Europe, North America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Venus built-in data transfer, Shipping hard drives, HTTP or FTP server
